headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid AOS and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, A. O. Smith’s stock price fell to $66.30. Shareholders have lost 19.6% of their capital, disappointing when considering the S&P 500 was flat. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
